instructions: Put the charger on the table at the bottom
place the dinner fork to the left of the charger, its tines facing up
place the dinner knife to the right of the charger, its blade facing charger
place the salad fork to the left of the dinner fork, its tines facing up
place the salad knife to the right of the dinner knife, its blade facing left
place the soup spoon to the right of the salad knife, its bowl pointing to the top
place the dessert spoon above the charger, centered, with its bowl to the left
place the desert fork between the dessert spoon and charger, its tines to the right
place the bread plate above the salad fork and to the left of the dessert spoon centered
place the butter knife diagonally on the bread plate with the blade facing away from the charger
place the water glass above the salad knife and to the right of the dessert fork
place the napkin in the center of the plate on the charger
